description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands on the home page.
Go to shoes category
Click on the first product and verify user lands on PDP page
Add product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that the product is there.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to http://localhost:3005
Verify that the home page is displayed after navigation
Select the shoes category to view relevant products
Choose the first product in the shoes category to view its details
Confirm that the Product Detail Page is properly loaded and displayed
Add the displayed product to the shopping cart
Navigate to the shopping cart page to review added items
Verify that the shopping cart contains the added product
Take a screenshot of the final shopping cart view to validate the test outcome

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Navigate, select product, and verify cart

description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands on the home page.
Add to cart the first product in "Just In" section of the page.
Go to cart page and verify that price is reflected correctly.
Increase quality by 1 using dropdown, and verify that the prices adjusts accordingly.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to http://localhost:3005.
Confirm that the home page loads by verifying the presence of the banner image.
Scroll to the 'Just In' section and add the first product to the cart.
Navigate to the cart page to review the items in the cart.
Verify that the displayed price for the added product is correct on the cart page.
Increase the product quantity by one using the dropdown option.
Confirm that the total price is recalculated correctly after increasing the quantity.
Take a screenshot of the final cart page to capture the updated pricing details.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Verify home page and cart functionality

description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands on the home page.
Add to cart the first product in "Just In" section of the page.
Go to cart page and verify that cart is not empty
Click the delete icon (svg) to remove the item
verify user gets "Your cart is empty" message

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the website at http://localhost:3005
Verify that the home page is displayed by confirming the presence of the banner image
Scroll to the 'Just In' section and add the first product to the shopping cart
Navigate to the cart page to review the shopping cart contents
Confirm that the cart is not empty and the added product is present
Click on the delete icon to remove the item from the cart
Verify that the message 'Your cart is empty' is displayed after deletion
Take a screenshot of the final cart state to confirm the test completion

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Home page navigation and cart item flow
